Name: corerad
Description: CoreRAD is an extensible and observable IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol router advertisement daemon. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: genetlink
Description: Package genetlink implements generic netlink interactions and data types. MIT Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: socket
Description: Package socket provides a low-level network connection type which integrates with Go's runtime network poller to provide asynchronous I/O and deadline support. MIT Licensed.

Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: ethtool
Description: Package ethtool allows control of the Linux ethtool generic netlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: consrv
Description: Command consrv is a SSH to serial console bridge server, originally designed for deployment on gokrazy.org devices. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: nbd-rs
Description: An asynchronous Rust client and server implementation of the Network Block Device (NBD) protocol. MIT Licensed.

Name: wifi
Description: Package wifi provides access to IEEE 802.11 WiFi device actions and statistics.  MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd
Description: Package apcupsd provides a client for the apcupsd Network Information Server (NIS).  MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from apcupsd's NIS. MIT Licensed.
